p: KSBH is considered a phytosanitary problem of national relevance in Mexico. The advantage of performing the PCR analysis directly from the DNA extraction of infected tissue in-vitro and in-vivo is a key innovation of the diagnosis system. Therefore, it is not necessary to isolate and grow the fungus. Our results inferred that the system may function at early infection stages however it is important to consider the use of and effective sampling method.
